name: GetGithubWorkflowRunAttempt
description:
Retrieve details of a specific GitHub workflow run attempt.

Use this tool to access detailed information about a specific workflow run attempt in a GitHub repository. Accessible with repository read permissions. Requires an access token for private repositories.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This value is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: workflow_run_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub workflow run. This integer specifies the exact run to retrieve information for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

parameters.name: workflow_attempt_number
parameters.description: The numeric identifier for the specific attempt of the workflow run to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

parameters.name: omit_pull_requests
parameters.description: Set to true to omit pull requests from the response.

value_schema.description: If `true` pull requests are omitted from the response (empty array).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: exclude_pull_requests
parameters.description: If `true` pull requests are omitted from the response (empty array).

value_schema.description: If `true` pull requests are omitted from the response (empty array).

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

parameters.name: attempt_number
parameters.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

value_schema.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
